text: EMIS Health is a company based in Leeds. It used to be called Egton Medical Information Systems. It runs electronic patient records for a majority of the general practices in the United Kingdom. It is also used by community pharmacies and some hospitals. It was bought by Bordeaux UK Holdings in 2022. Bordeaux is part of UnitedHealth. ==References== Category:Healthcare companies Category:Companies of England Category:Organisations based in Leeds Category:Medical and health organisations in the United Kingdom
title: EMIS Health
